snippet: Few people played a more pivotal role in Rick Santorum’s victories in Minnesota, Missouri and Colorado than Foster Friess, a wealthy donor to conservative causes.
abstract: Foster Friess, wealthy donor to conservative causes, played pivotal role in Rick Santorum's victories in Minnesota, Missouri and Colorado; he is chief backer of a super PAC that has helped keep Santorum's candidacy alive; his role as outside funder escalates the battle among a few wealthy Republicans to influence their party's choice of a presidential nominee.

byline.original: By JIM RUTENBERG and NICHOLAS CONFESSORE

lead_paragraph: Few people played a more pivotal role in Rick Santorum’s victories in Minnesota, Missouri and Colorado than Foster Friess, a wealthy donor to conservative causes.

headline.seo: Foster Friess, a Santorum Supporter With Deep Pockets
headline.main: A Wealthy Backer Likes the Odds on Santorum
headline.print_headline: A Wealthy Backer Likes the Odds on Santorum
